name: matterviz-wasm
description: WASM bindings for ferrox structure matching library

scripts.build: cd .. && wasm-pack build --target web --features wasm --no-default-features && cd wasm && rm -rf pkg && cp -r ../pkg . && rm -f pkg/.gitignore && mkdir -p data && cp ../src/atomic_scattering_params.json data/ && deno run -A generate_types.ts
scripts.build:dev: cd .. && wasm-pack build --target web --features wasm --no-default-features --dev && cd wasm && rm -rf pkg && cp -r ../pkg . && rm -f pkg/.gitignore && mkdir -p data && cp ../src/atomic_scattering_params.json data/ && deno run -A generate_types.ts

author: Janosh Riebesell <janosh.riebesell@gmail.com>
